name: Body Detection

outputs.name: Begin
outputs.description: Execute the next node when any part of the body is detected

outputs.name: Stay
outputs.description: Keep executing the next node when the body stays in the scene

outputs.name: End
outputs.description: Execute the next node when the body disappeared

outputs.name: None
outputs.description: Keep executing the next node when nobody is detected

description: Detect body in the scene to create interacting effect.
